umm it doesnt work with .pdf pls help :)

@ e-pubbing. google calibre software. download and install it. drag and drop the epub or mobi to calibre. right click on the book file and click convert individually. on the top right you will see options to convert it to different formats. choose pdf. and let it do the conversion. thats it.
